title: Forced disconnect via riot servers
body: Riot servers forcefully disconnected which caused a surrender vote due to someone having to leave to go through. We were winning the game too so riot I demand that I get my 300 victory IP.

replies.body: There haven't been any issues or downtime that would force players off their match.  If you're still having this issue, I suggest going through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure your connection is working properly.  We won't be restoring points or game stats, so make sure to follow the guide to prevent further occurrences!
